resources.string:
•80 centimeters LED 1366 x 768 
•For requesting installation/wall mounting/demo of this product once delivered, please directly call Samsung support on 1800 3000 8282 
•Connectivity - Input : HDMI*1, USB*1 
•Warranty Information : 1 year warranty provided by the manufacturer from date of purchase

•80Powerful suction and blower function 
•Dual functions for collecting dry dust and wet spills 
•Wide range of accessories to suit varied cleaning needs 
•Specially designed 360 degree swivel wheels for easy movement 
•Larger capacity of plastic container for water-8 litres and dust-10 litres collection 
•Automatic cord winder for convenience 
•Convenient 8 meter radius of operation

•Product Dimensions: Length (31.44 inches), Width (18.47 inches), Height (42.05 inches) 
•Primary Material: MDF 
•Color: Dark Brown, Style: Modern 
•Assembly Required: The product requires carpenter assembly and will be provided by the seller 
•Warranty: 30 days warranty on manufacturing defects only 
•Made of MDF and has dark finish

•Product Dimensions: Length (21 inches), Width (21 inches), Height (48 inches) 
•Primary Material: Leatherette 
•Color: Brown, Style: Modern 
•Assembly Required: The product requires basic assembly and comes with assembly instructions 
•Warranty: 3 months except leatherette 
•Adjustable seat height 
•Tilt mechanism 
•Nylon wheels

•Product Dimension: Length: 47 inches, Width: 18 inches, Height: 71 inches 
•Primary Material: Particle Board 
•Color: Beige, Finish: Glossy, Style: Contemporary 
•Assembly Required: The product requires carpenter assembly and will be provided by the seller 
•Warranty: 1 year on product. 
•Available with matching king bed

•Stainless steel cavity and LED display with clock 
•10 power levels and 10 temperature levels 
•Grill, microwave and convection 
•Speed defrost and multi stage cooking 
•24 auto cook menus 
•Express cooking quick start, auto reheat, keep warm and child safety lock 
•Warranty: 1 year on machine, 3 years on Magnetron and Cavity
